flawed_nl_solution:
If Charley bought 30 pencils and lost 6 while moving, she remained with 30-6=<<30-6=28>>28 pencils.
Because she isn't good at keeping track of her pencils, Charley lost 1/3*28 = <<1/3*28=28/3>>28/3 more pencils.
She currently has 28-28/3 = <<28-28/3=56/3>>56/3 pencils.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 28. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
